text.emotional: You can do a lot with it, too: sell it, feed it to pigs, make chaff with a forage harvester, or check for available soy productions to increase your profit.
text.silence: {.} you can do a lot with it too {...} sell it {...} feed it to pigs {....} make chaff with a forage harvester {....} or check for available soy productions to increase your profit {...}
